thumb.title: Black Sun / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Black SunThe colors of the sunset blur on the asphaltアスファルトに滲む 夕焼けの色As the city lights come on one by one街の灯りが ひとつずつ灯る頃Something sinks deep in my heart胸の奥深く 沈んでいく何かA heavy, deep, black sun重く 深く 黒い太陽Days gone by cast a shadow過ぎ去った日々が 影を落とすIn a time where regret and hope intersect後悔と希望 交錯する時間の中But I still start walking, even if it's weakそれでも歩き出す 弱くてもSearching for a thin light that leads to tomorrow明日へと続く 細い光を探してIn the sinking sky of the black sun黒い太陽 沈む空にHolding these feelings that seem to be burning out燃え尽きそうな この気持ちを抱いてBut even so, tomorrow will come againそれでもまた 明日が来るTowards a future illuminated by the black sun黒い太陽 照らされる未来へI'll go and find the light of hope希望の光 見つけに行くよHolding a strong light in my heart強い光を 胸に抱いてMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : blitz
